channel.title: Lewiston|Nez Perce County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Lewiston|Nez Perce County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-12 East/US-95 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 South/US-12 East to Grangeville, Missoula (MT - via US-12), and Boise.

item.title: US-95 South at US-12
item.description: US-95 south at US-12 junction. Merge right for US-12 West/Lewiston/Walla Walla (Washington). Use left lane for US-95 South/US-12 East/Missoula (Montana)/Boise. Use either lane for access to Runaway Truck Ramps.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching US-12
item.description: US-95 south approaching US-12. Use right lane for US-12 west to Lewiston; left lane for US-95 South/US-12 East to Boise.

item.title: US-12 East At US-95
item.description: US-12 East at US-95. Merge left for US-95 north to Moscow and Coeur d’Alene. Use right lanes for US-12 East/US-95 South/Missoula (Montana)/Boise. US-95 south joins US-12 east for about 10 miles eastbound along the Clearwater River.

item.title: US-12 East Approaching US-95
item.description: US-12 east approaching US-95. Use right lanes for US-12 East/US-95 South/Missoula (Montana)/Boise.

item.title: US-12 East at ID-128
item.description: US-12 east at ID-128 in Lewiston. Use ID-128 for the Lewiston, Clarkston, and Wilma Port Districts.

item.title: US-12 East - Levee Bypass at Main St.
item.description: US-12 East at Main St. Turn left on Main St. to continue east on US-12 to US-95 and Missoula (Montana).

item.title: US-12 East - Levee Bypass at Main St.
item.description: US-12 East on Levee Bypass approaching Main St. Turn left on Main St. to continue on US-12.

item.title: US-12 East - Interstate Bridge
item.description: US-12 east at end of Interstate Bridge. Turn right to continue east on US-12 for US-95 and Missoula (Montana).

item.title: US-12 East - Interstate Bridge
item.description: US-12 east on Idaho side of Interstate Bridge over the Snake River. Merge right to continue east on US-12.

item.title: ID-128 West - Port Districts
item.description: ID-128 at the Port of Lewiston. Continue ahead for the Ports of Clarkston (WA) and Wilma (WA).

item.title: ID-128 West - Lewiston
item.description: ID-128 west in Lewiston. ID-128 follows the north side of the Clearwater and Snake River, and connects with WA-128.

item.title: US-12 West at ID-128
item.description: US-12 west approaching ID-128 in Lewiston. Merge right for ID-128 west to Lewiston, Clarkston, and Wilma Port Districts. Merge left for US-12 west to Lewiston and Clarkston (WA).

item.title: US-12 West Approaching ID-128
item.description: US-12 west approaching ID-128 in Lewiston.

item.title: US-95 South at US-12
item.description: US-95 south at US-12 junction. Merge right for US-12 West/Lewiston/Walla Walla (Washington). Use left lane for US-95 South/US-12 East/Missoula (Montana)/Boise. Use either lane for access to Runaway Truck Ramps.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching US-12
item.description: US-95 south approaching US-12. Use right lane for US-12 west to Lewiston; left lane for US-95 South/US-12 East to Boise.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching US-12
item.description: US-95 south approaching US-12 West - Clarkston at the foot of Lewiston Hill.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching US-12
item.description: US-95 South approaching US-12 West to Lewiston and Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: US-12 East/US-95 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 South/US-12 East to Grangeville, Missoula (MT - via US-12), and Boise. The Clearwater River is on the right side of the picture.

item.title: Frontage Road at US-95/US-12
item.description: Frontage Road at US-12/US-95 junction. The steam in the background is from the Potlatch Paper Mill.

item.title: US-95 South at US-12
item.description: US-95 south at US-12 at the bottom of the Lewiston Hill. The welcome to Lewiston sign is right above the speed limit sign on the left side of the photo. Lewiston is the lowest city in Idaho - 738 feet. There are Runaway Truck Ramps on either side of the photo.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching US-12
item.description: Route diagram for US-95/US-12 junction on US-95 south. View of the Clearwater Valley and the city of Lewiston. The river in the background is the Clearwater River.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching US-12
item.description: US-95 south approaching US-12 west to Clarkston (Washington).

item.title: US-95 South Approaching US-12
item.description: US-95 south on the Lewiston Hill approaching US-12 west to Lewiston/Walla Walla.

item.title: US-95 North/US-12 at US-12 West
item.description: US-95 North/US-12 West at US-95/US-12 split. Use right lane for US-95 north to Moscow and Coeur d’Alene. Use left lanes for US-12 west to Lewiston and Walla Walla (Washington).
